Description: Escape to this spacious 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom home in the serene neighborhood of Willow Creek. Enjoy the large backyard with a deck perfect for entertaining guests. The updated kitchen features stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. With easy access to hiking trails and a community pool, this home is perfect for outdoor enthusiasts.
Neighborhood Description: Willow Creek offers a peaceful setting with tree-lined streets and friendly neighbors. Explore the nearby Willow Creek Park or take a short drive to the Willow Creek Shopping Center for dining and shopping options.

Description: Luxury awaits in this stunning 5-bedroom, 4-bathroom home in the prestigious Sunset Hills neighborhood. The grand foyer leads to a gourmet kitchen with high-end appliances and a spacious island. Relax in the master suite with a spa-like bathroom and walk-in closet. The backyard oasis features a pool and outdoor kitchen, perfect for summer gatherings.
Neighborhood Description: Sunset Hills is known for its upscale homes and scenic views. Residents can enjoy the Sunset Hills Country Club or take a short drive to the Sunset Hills Winery for wine tasting. With top-rated schools and easy access to highways, this neighborhood is ideal for families.

Description: Experience luxury living in this expansive 6-bedroom, 5-bathroom home in the exclusive Riverfront Estates. The open floor plan features a grand living room with a fireplace and floor-to-ceiling windows. The chef's kitchen boasts custom cabinetry and a breakfast nook overlooking the river. Retreat to the master suite with a private balcony and spa-like bathroom. The outdoor space includes a dock for boating and a fire pit for cozy evenings.
Neighborhood Description: Riverfront Estates offers a private and tranquil setting along the river. Residents can enjoy fishing, kayaking, and picnicking in the nearby Riverfront Park. With gated entry and 24-hour security, this neighborhood provides a safe and luxurious lifestyle.

Description: Enjoy mountain views from this charming 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom home in the desirable Mountain View Heights neighborhood. The cozy living room features a stone fireplace and vaulted ceilings. The updated kitchen offers granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. Relax in the backyard oasis with a hot tub and outdoor dining area.
Neighborhood Description: Mountain View Heights is known for its scenic beauty and outdoor recreation opportunities. Residents can hike the nearby trails or visit the Mountain View Heights Golf Course for a round of golf. With a strong sense of community and top-rated schools, this neighborhood is perfect for families.

Description: Live the coastal lifestyle in this 4-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom home in the waterfront community of Harbor Pointe. The spacious floor plan features a gourmet kitchen with a large island and water views. The master suite offers a private balcony and a luxurious en-suite bathroom. Relax on the deck overlooking the marina or take a short walk to the beach for a day of sun and surf.
Neighborhood Description: Harbor Pointe is a boater's paradise with easy access to the marina and yacht club. Residents can enjoy waterfront dining at the Harbor Pointe Restaurant or take a sunset cruise along the coast. With a vibrant waterfront scene and close proximity to shopping and entertainment, this neighborhood offers the best of coastal living.

Description: Discover country living in this 5-bedroom, 3-bathroom home in the peaceful Oak Ridge Estates. The wrap-around porch welcomes you into the spacious living room with a cozy fireplace. Neighborhood Description: Oak Ridge Estates is a quiet and picturesque neighborhood with rolling hills and mature trees. With a strong sense of community and a rural charm, this neighborhood is ideal for those seeking a tranquil lifestyle.
